domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
@MattHancock I don't want to watch horses racing round a track, making £££'s for the government tax.
I want to drive to see my parents, however
a. they live too far away to make it a day trip
b. I'm not a government advisor with coronavirus so I don't feel inclined to break the rules
